Micah is a 12-year-old from china male diagnosed with solid tumor in the nerve cells.
He has had problems in school.

Micah is a 12-year-old Chinese male diagnosed with Neuroblastoma. Neuroblastoma is a solid cancerous tumor that begins in the nerve cells outside the brain of infants and young children. It can start in the nerve tissue near the spine in the neck, chest, abdomen, or pelvis, but it most often begins in the adrenal glands. The adrenal glands are located on top of both kidneys and make hormones that help control body functions, such as heart rate and blood pressure.He has a second cancer.
Micah is a 12-year-old Chinese male diagnosed with Neuroblastoma. He has a second cancer. He has had problems in school.
